attributes.action: immediately dissolve the West Northamptonshire Development Corporation (WNDC) and return forthwith all planning powers to the elected Councils of the County.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The West Northamptonshire Development Corporation is an unelected, undemocratic Quango set up by Central Government to redevelop and greatly expand the Borough of Northampton and western side of the county. It's willingness to seek or take into account the views of the general public, and in particular those of the residents of Northamptonshire, is considered highly questionable. The controversy over the proposed “Northampton Needle” is a prime example. Despite these points, the Corporation has extensive powers and decides on all major planning issues for the area. This is a disgrace.
